mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product(pno, title, content, writer, price) values(seq_product_pno.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{price})
mapper.select: select pno,title,writer,price,moddate,readcount from tbl_product order by pno desc
mapper.update: update tbl_product set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, price=#{price}, moddate=sysdate where pno=#{pno}
